items.content_html: Open fair-code platform on top of headless commerce. High performant Astro + Vue PWA & Jamstack storefront with built-in CMS. Integrations for payments, shipping, ERPs, CRMs and others. Truly extensible event-driven and serverless architecture. Easy and cheap deploy to Firebase.
items.title: ecomplus/cloud-commerce: Open fair-code platform on top of headless commerce. High performant Astro + Vue PWA & Jamstack storefront with built-in CMS. Integrations for payments, shipping, ERPs, CRMs and others. Truly extensible event-driven and serverless architecture. Easy and cheap deploy to Firebase.

items.content_html: This tool deletes all empty LogStreams in AWS Clodwatch. For this purpose, Lambdas are generated using the serverless framework, which search for empty CloudWatch streams and then remove them. This procedure makes sense when working with LogRetention, which remove LogEvents after a configured time. Only LogStreams of the lambdas are removed.
items.title: smirowstanitzok/logstream-cleanup: This tool deletes all empty LogStreams in AWS Clodwatch. For this purpose, Lambdas are generated using the serverless framework, which search for empty CloudWatch streams and then remove them. This procedure makes sense when working with LogRetention, which remove LogEvents after a configured time. Only LogStreams of the lambdas are removed.
